title: Tapping into the Potential of Digital Health
itunes:title: Tapping into the Potential of Digital Health
description: Tim Blake, the founder and managing director of Semantic Consulting, helps organizations grapple with digital change and digital disruption.  And he talks with Daniel about the challenges and potential of digital healthcare – as well as what he learned as the chief information officer of the Tasmanian Health System, such as, “Sometimes problems can be far simpler than we think they are when you ask the communities that really genuinely own those problems.”
author: CVS Health
itunes:author: CVS Health
